name: ChronoPhasor
description:
ChronoPhasor has you temporarily rewinding time for yourself to avoid platforming mishaps, dodge enemy attacks, and dish out additional damage. Just be careful about your positioning!

A game made in one week for the Brackey's Jam 2020.2! The theme this year was "rewind".

Main tileset is "Forgotten Dungeon" by Blackwolfdave on opengameart.org

Additional audio from zapsplat.com

Dungeon Ambience by JaggedStone on opengameart.org
